column4: My system crashed and now synaptic package management isn't working and I can't install updates... how do I reinstall synapitc package manager?
it says "Error: Opening the cache etc)
E: Type '<device' is not known on line 1 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/edgy-multiverse.list
E: The list of sources could not be read.
That is what it says when I do that.
pastebin the output of this command "cat /etc/apt/sources.list.d/edgy-multiverse.list"
then do sudo apt-get update and all should be good
what is the error when you do "sudo apt-get update"
it doesn't look that bad. You have synaptic closed right
I had to hard reset during an install... I think my hard disk controller on this board is flakey honestly.
try some clean up stuff, like sudo dpkg --configure -a and then sudo apt-get install -f
Thanks for the help by the way... I've been using linux on and off as small servers etc for years, but desktop linux I haven't used in about 3-4 years
Neg on both of those, wouldn't run
looks bad then, something seriously wrong with dpkg
